title: Client crash and Stuck at 0% on reconnect screen
body: My client crashed and now i'm stuck. I'm in the middle of a ranked game and i'm so upset right now.. I really don't want to disappoint my team or lose LP. Please i've tried everything.

replies.body: Were you able to get back into the game, or still having this issue?  I'd like to help out here, but I could use some more details.  Did you get any errors, and what did it say?  Where or when did you crash exactly? Let me know!
